uvi.description:
media: firewire: firedtv-avc: fix a buffer overflow in avc_ca_pmt()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.158 by commit 2461f38384d50dd966e1db44fe165b1896f5df5a. For more details please see the references link.
